issues.description: The solution’s Animal class defines an extra attribute ‘age’ and its constructor takes (String name, int age), but the problem statement’s UML and description specify only a ‘name’ attribute for Animal. This extra parameter also appears in Seal, Pig, and Goat constructors, conflicting with the intended design where animals only have a name.
issues.suggested_fix: Remove the ‘age’ attribute and corresponding constructor parameter from Animal and its subclasses so that only the ‘name’ attribute is initialized, matching the UML specification.
